performance_at_interview_what_to_improve: Connor failed several of the recruitment criteria.  Biggest issue was motivation to teach.  He could not convincingly outline his motivation to teach or improve children's welfare.  This is the most important thing for him to address.  Connor's micro teaching was also a concern, it was planned very loosely with little in the way of structure or learning.  It gave an impression that Connor did not understand the complexity of teaching at secondary level.  His interview did  not convince the panel that he genuinely wanted to train to teach or had the necessary dedication or capacity to train
